name: Phoenix Fire - Prologue
description:
Director: Adam Z Hajdu
Producer: Viktória Berta
Game Designer: Robert Pinter "Sinas" 
Programmer: Adam Z Hajdu
Environment Concept Artist: Barbara Tar
Environment Artist: Adam Z Hajdu https://www.artstation.com/adamzhajdu
Writer: Koppányfy “Puszta” Dávid
Engine: Unreal Engine 4
Platform: PC
Release: Windows 01/01/2021
Genre: Puzzle
Mode: Single-player

Recommended System Requirement

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4720HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8.00GB
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960M
  • Storage: 5 GB

Concept
Showing why self knowledge is important, through a loss.

Based on Unreal Engine 4 Realistic Render project.
